product_name: The North Face Seymore Shell Pants - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Hit the slopes in The North Face Seymore Shell pants that provide waterproof, breathable protection in a classic cut for all-day riding. Durable nylon shell stands up to wear and tear. HyVent(R) 2L waterproof, breathable technology uses a multilayer polyurethane coating for waterproof protection and durability; pants are fully seam sealed. Thermoliner polyester lining easily slides over base layer and offers light warmth. Rip-and-stick adjustment tabs at side of waist and zippered, snap-closure fly secure the fit. StretchVent gaiters with gripper elastic seal out snow around boots and help regulate warmth. Reinforced cuffs resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis. Buddy lift clip keeps your pass close at hand. Pant-a-locks secure pants to coordinating jackets from The North Face (coordinating jackets are not included with the purchase of this item). Twin hand pockets and a cargo pocket let you stash map and other small essentials. Closeout.
short_description: Hit the slopes in The North Face Seymore Shell pants that provide waterproof, breathable protection in a classic cut for all-day riding.
